alert.note: Alert for O'Brien; Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 4:51PM CST until December 15 at 5:30PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sioux County in northwestern Iowa... O`Brien County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 530 PM CST. * At 450 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ireton to near Cherokee, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Sioux Center around 505 PM CST. Rock Valley, Hull and Sutherland around 510 PM CST. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northwestern Iowa...and southeastern South Dakota. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across parts of Nebraska into Woodbury county. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northwestern Iowa...and southeastern South Dakota.
